forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 20C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 68F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.
